creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: rectangular and square red silk patches embroidered with phoenix and insects surrounded by applique layers; phoenix design repeated on ties; pink fringe on ties and bottom with small ruffle; blue print lining
dimension:
17 1/2 x 11 1/2 in. (44.45 x 29.21 cm) (including fringe)
38 1/2 in. (97.79 cm) (object part, ties, including fringe)
title: Apron
